name: Grim Short Horror
description:
Short Horror with 2 levels with puzzles and shooting

Menus can be buggy after you die just reload the game should work fine

Made along side Jimmy Vegas and his horror game tutorials 

https://jvunity.weebly.com/

spoiler if you get stuck on the 2ed level there is a puzzle you need to put the 2 heart pieces into the Metal looking shelf in the kitchen P.S vase is breakable.
